Contact project documentation¶

Add your content using reStructuredText syntax. See the reStructuredText documentation for details.

REST API main¶

REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Creates a new contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactSchema) – The schema containing the contact details.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – The user for whom the contact is created.

Returns:

The newly created contact.

Return type:

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Deletes a specific contact by its ID for a given user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to delete.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – The user who owns the contact.

Returns:

The deleted contact, or None if not found.

Return type:

Contact or None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Retrieves a specific contact by its ID for a given user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve the contact for.

Returns:

The contact with the specified ID, or None if not found.

Return type:

Contact or None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • offset (int) – The number of contactss to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Retrieves a list of contacts whose birthdays are within the next 7 days.

Parameters:

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve upcoming birthdays for.

Returns:

A list of contacts with upcoming birthdays.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.search_contacts(query, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Searches for contacts based on a query string in the first name, surname, or email.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – The search query string.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – The user to search contacts for.

Returns:

A list of contacts matching the query.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdateSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Updates an existing contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to update.

  • body (ContactUpdateSchema) – The schema containing the updated contact details.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – The user who owns the contact.

Returns:

The updated contact, or None if not found.

Return type:

Contact or None
